column7: 2015 at the bethany home in minden. graveside services will be on saturday
column9: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at the minden cemetery with rev. michael schmidt officiating. there will be no visitation. layton-craig funeral home in minden is in charge of arrangements. john was born on february 11
column11: ne to mervin and verla marie (williamsen) branting. he grew up in bruning
column12: ne and graduated from bruning high school. he married sharon hawks and they lived and farmed near bruning. they moved to north platte and in 1971 started working for the union pacific railroad. he served in the national guard from 1971 until 1976. john married darlene fisher wright and they lived in the ogallala and brule area. john retired from the railroad as a general supervisor in 2005. john enjoyed working in his large garden
column13: woodworking and making flower trains. survivors include his wife
column16: missy and matt branting and wife
column17: amy all of gilbert az; 2 daughters
column19: ia and deanna veik of mesa
column24: ne and robert wright and wife
column29: gary of lincoln and peggy wilbeck and husband
column30: doug of minden. he is preceded in death by his parents and brother
